channel.description: Recent content in Enzyme Catalysis on RD's Blog

item.title: Book Recommendation: Dynamics in Enzyme Catalysis
item.description: An advanced collection of papers exploring the role of dynamics in enzyme catalysis, co-edited by Judith Klinman and Sharon Hammes-Schiffer. Includes my annotated version and a clean copy for download.
